daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A NYC woman was tragically killed by a flying solar panel during a nor'easter, while the city faces ongoing challenges including Broadway strikes, a bleak budget ahead of the mayoral race, and significant complaints from tenants regarding broker fees.
